string.text: I heard your message. Need a guide?
Sorry, but you don't have the money to pay me in case the plan doesn't go through.
Remind me, where are we going?
Finally! Thanks, stalker, nice work. Here's your money.
I've changed my mind, I don't want to continue with it.
Really? Are you sure about that?
Looking for a guide who can lead me to %s. Right now, I'm %s. Name's %s.
We're too late. I'm gonna be needing %s roubles back. %s out.

Glad someone heard it. Here's the deal - in %s hours, I need to be %s. I can pay you %s rubles for the job, but keep in mind that you're going to need to pay me %s rubles if we don't get there in time.
Then I'll continue on my own - and I'll be taking that money. What a shame.
Length, including starting point and destination:
